山颪: (やまおろし) - wind blowing down from a mountain

山鳴り: (やまなり) - rumbling of a mountain

山麓: (sanroku) - pé de uma montanha, base de uma montanha
屹度: (キッと) - (きっと only)  surely/undoubtedly/almost certainly/most likely (e.g. 90 percent); (esp. キッと) sternly/severely; (きっと only) having no slack/rigid/stiff/tight; (きっと only)  suddenly/abruptly/instantly
屹然: (きつぜん) - towering/lofty; standing out without the influence of others/in splendid isolation
屹立: (きつりつ) - standing tall; towering; soaring
岌々: (きゅうきゅう) - tall (as a mountain, etc.); exceedingly dangerous
岌岌: (きゅうきゅう) - tall (as a mountain, etc.); exceedingly dangerous

岡引き: (おかひき) - hired thief taker (Edo period); private secret policeman; private detective

岩盤風呂: (がんばんぶろ) - stone sauna; facility where one rests on towels laid on a slab of heated natural rock
